name: @shopana/orchestrator-service
description: Service orchestrator for running multiple services in a single process

scripts.build:all: yarn workspace @shopana/apps-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/payments-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/inventory-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/media-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/pricing-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/delivery-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/checkout-service build && yarn workspace @shopana/orders-service build && yarn build
